TopicTitle: what parts can have the flag on them?

Articles.Content: hey guys just wondering what are all the parts that can have the flag placed on them I only know of command pods and the claw so far
I was only aware of solid objects, I.E. Moons/planets.

I was only aware of solid objects, I.E. Moons/planets.

I think he means the flag decal that can be placed on the Klaw and command pods, also unless I am mistaken, it can be placed on the new 3.75m fuel tanks.
I'm sure is aw a mod called Velcro where you can fix flags to most of the stock parts. I'm not sure if it's been updated to 0.23.5 though.
